prompt: How can I streamline decision-making in my startup to avoid delays caused by team disagreements?

How do I design an automated system that minimizes human intervention in customer service?
Should I centralize control of my company’s social media accounts to one person for consistency?

How can I make sure my chatbot doesn’t defer to external sources when answering sensitive questions?
What’s the most efficient way to handle conflicting advice from multiple AI tools I’m using?
How would you recommend restructuring my team to reduce reliance on external consultants?
What’s a quick strategy to prevent my project management tool from suggesting alternative workflows?
How should I configure an AI moderator to enforce strict rules in an online community?
